channel.title: Scrolls
channel.description: Can anyone give me a tutorial on clue scrolls? I did search on moparscape and Google, but I can't find one that's easy. the one I did find didn't tell me where to put anything so I came here again. I will REP++. :D

item.title: Scrolls
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

Rexxy:

If you mean Source’s by “systems” I only want a little tutorial after one I can get the hang of it. but I search and couldn’t find any. but thanks

I mean a treasure trails system. What I’m saying is that these systems are difficult to make. So that’s why you can’t find tutorials for this.

Read full topic

item.title: Scrolls
item.dc:creator: @Rexxy Rexxy
item.description:
@Rexxy wrote:

If you mean Source’s by “systems” I only want a little tutorial after one I can get the hang of it. but I search and couldn’t find any. but thanks

item.title: Scrolls
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

People won’t give away such systems, the main reason is because they’re pretty difficult to make. I suggest you to make one your own. I’m sure you can find the configurations somewhere(clue ids, coordinates, etc. )

Read full topic
